title: Is technology destroying jobs, or will it do so soon? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, for about 250 years, technology — the Industrial Revolution — has been destroying jobs. At the same it it has been creating jobs. This process was named Creative Destruction by the economist Joseph Schumpeter. My great-grandfather raised and trained work horses, a profession that was destroyed by mass-assembly automobiles. I work in educational technology, a profession that did not exist 20 years ago.
NO but it is alerting you for continuous upgradation with the skill set you have. In coming time only continuous learner will survive.
